name: MINIMIDI x Paris MX V2 - old

metadata.name: Paris MX Graffiti Piano #1
metadata.description:
In collaboration with the monolithic British graffiti artist Paris MX, MINIMIDI presents a timeless collection of 5 digital piano "totems" representing the entanglement modern music has with traditional art.

The release of this 1/1 collection elegantly coincides with the 10 year anniversary of Paris' work on the Live Tour for Coldplay's 5th studio album "Mylo Xyloto", and the 11th Birthday of the album which originally released on October 24th, 2011. Paris' unique Graffiti style is featured on numerous assets accompanying the album and the proceeding "MX" world tour throughout 2012. This tour saw musical instruments anywhere from guitars, drum sets, and upright pianos each uniquely spray-painted by Paris himself in the colorful style of "Mylo Xyloto" - complete with thematic symbolism and song lyrics from the album. This collection looks to emulate that.

Find more from Paris here:  
https://porigins.bigcartel.com/

Learn more about the MINIMIDI project here:  
https://midi-metaverse.com/

MINIMIDI Founded by musician Lliam B. Evans of Flakestate  
https://linktr.ee/flakestate/
